content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello, Mr. Smith. I'm pleased to have you here. Indeed, we should discuss the rental price. How much were you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I'm looking for a fair price since I'm a student and want to be cautious with my expenses. I'd like to propose a rate of 650 euros per month, all-inclusive. What do you think?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: 650 euros per month, all-inclusive, you say? That's an interesting proposal, Mr. Smith. Can you tell me more about what's included in this rate?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Certainly, Mr. Heine. The 650 euros per month would cover the rent for the 25-square-meter apartment, as well as any additional fees or utilities. I'm looking for a straightforward arrangement that won't have any hidden costs. Is this something that could work for you?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Hidden costs? No, no hidden costs, Mr. Smith. But 650 euros per month, all-inclusive, seems quite generous on your part. Are you sure you can afford such a price? It's quite high for the area, you know.
name: Heinrich Heine
